name: EZY DOSE Kids Baby Oral Syringe & Dispenser Calibrated for Liquid Medicine, Reduce Mess and Spills, Easy Way to Orally Administer Medication, 10 mL/2 TSP, Includes Bottle Adapter, Clear, BPA Free
short_description: ACCURATE DOSING MADE EASY: The EZY DOSE Baby Oral Syringe & Dispenser is calibrated for precise liquid medication delivery up to 10mL/2 TSP, ensuring accurate dosage for babies and toddlers every time

BPA-FREE & SAFE MATERIALS: Crafted from BPA-free, child-safe materials, this oral syringe is designed for worry-free use, making it ideal for administering liquid medicines, vitamins, and supplements to infants and young children

REDUCE MESS & SPILLS: Features an innovative design with a bottle adapter that minimizes spills and mess, allowing you to draw medicine directly from the bottle for a seamless and clean dosing experience

EASY TO USE & CLEAN: The ergonomic design ensures a comfortable grip and smooth operation, while the clear markings make it simple to measure and dispense the correct amount. Easy-to-clean construction ensures hassle-free maintenance

VERSATILE & PORTABLE: Perfect for at-home or on-the-go use, this 10mL oral syringe fits easily into your baby care kit. Whether it's liquid medicine or supplements, it’s a reliable tool for precise dosing
product_description: Simplify medication time with the EZY DOSE Baby Oral Syringe & Dispenser, the perfect solution for administering liquid medicines, vitamins, and supplements to your baby or toddler. This calibrated syringe ensures precise dosing up to 10mL/2 TSP, reducing the risk of over- or under-dosing. Made from BPA-free, child-safe materials, this oral syringe is designed with your child’s safety in mind. The included bottle adapter allows you to draw medicine directly from the bottle, eliminating spills and mess for a clean and efficient dosing experience. The clear markings and ergonomic design make it easy for parents to measure and dispense liquid medication with confidence. Lightweight and portable, this syringe is perfect for use at home or while traveling, ensuring accurate dosing wherever you go. Whether you’re giving pain relievers, vitamins, or other liquid medications, the EZY DOSE Baby Oral Syringe & Dispenser offers a safe, mess-free, and reliable solution for parents seeking convenience and precision.

name: 10ml Oral Syringe With Cap (100 Pack) | Oral Dispenser Without Needle, Luer Slip Tip | Individually Wrapped Medicine Dropper For Infants & Pets
short_description: UNMATCHED QUALITY & UNBEATABLE VALUE – The 10ml medicine syringe 100 pack is perfect for individuals looking to stock up and save money. Each syringe is made from medical-grade plastic and comes with a cover. They’re also 100% latex-free.
EASIEST TO USE NO NEEDLE SYRINGE – Each oral syringe has easy-to-read measurements (teaspoons and millimeters) and a smooth-glide plunger.

SECURELY PACKAGED – The 10cc dispenser syringes are designed for single use and individually sealed for safety and sterility. The liquid dispensers are securely shipped in heavy-duty, tamper-proof packaging.

EASY WAY TO ORALLY ADMINISTER MEDICINE – Trouble swallowing pills? These large syringes without needle are the perfect choice for giving liquid oral medicine to infants, toddlers, dogs, and cats. They’re also excellent for irrigating a wound.

USEFUL TOOL FOR A VARIETY OF PROJECTS – Most customers use the syringes for medicinal purposes, but they’re also excellent for other projects where you need exact measurements such as arts and crafts projects and even jello shots for a party.
product_description: If you’re looking for a quick, easy way to give liquid medicine to your child, dog or cat then these oral dispensers are a perfect choice. The bulk pack comes with (100) 10ml syringes without needle. They’re individually wrapped with cap for safety and designed for single use. The syringes are made from latex-free, medical-grade plastic that’s safe for children and pets. They have luer slip tips preventing leaks and air from getting in. The plungers deliver a smooth glide so you can hold your child or pet’s mouth open with one hand and easily push down on the plunger with the other. These are professional-quality no needle syringes suitable for use at home as well as doctor’s offices, pediatricians, hospitals, pharmacies, walk in clinics, and more. They’re packaged securely ensuring your order arrives safely without any damage.

name: 10ml Oral Syringes - 100 Pack – Luer Slip Tip, No Needle, Individually Blister Packed - Medicine Administration For Infants, Toddlers and Small Pets (No cover)
short_description: QUALITY CONSTRICTION. These Brandzig 10ml Syringes are individually blister packed for safe use, expertly made from latex-free, medical grade plastic for durability and to eliminate the risk of an allergic reaction.

ORAL DISPENSER. Small in size, this syringe is ideal for administering medication to infants, toddlers and small pets. It sends the medicine to the side of the cheek, bypassing the taste buds to reduce the chances of spit-ups and ensuring an accurate dosage.
VERSATILE USE. It can also be used for projects that require small measurements or precise application.

CHOICE OF SIZE. To accommodate your needs, the oral syringes are available in 1-, 3-, 5- and 10-ml capacities. Each syringe is calibrated in both teaspoons and milliliters for precise measuring and delivering accurate doses of medicine.

AMPLE SUPPLY. Ideal for doctors, pediatric clinics, hospitals, pharmacies, health fairs and home use, each box contains 100 syringes to provide you with a sufficient supply. Each sterile syringe is individually sealed and designed for one time use only.
product_description: Do you find it difficult to give your small child or pet medicine ? Are they constantly spitting out the medicine , creating a mess and making it impossible for you to know how much medicine they actually received ? With these Brandzig Oral Dispenser Syringes , your struggles will finally be over. Sold in a 100-count box , this sufficient supply is ideal for doctors, clinics, hospitals, pharmacies and home use. They’re available in 1-, 3-, 5- and 10-ml capacities , allowing you to efficiently administer medication to infants, children and small pets . Unlike feeding medicine with a spoon or cup, this oral dispenser sends the medicine to the side of the cheek , bypassing the taste buds to reduce the chances of spit-ups and messes . It is safe for use, each syringe is expertly made from medical grade plastic without latex to eliminate allergic reactions. The syringe is translucent for easy visibility , calibrated in both teaspoons and milliliters to allow for accurate measurements so you can deliver the proper dosage of medication . Individually sealed to ensure it’s clean and sterile , each disposable syringe is designed for one-time use only for sanitation purposes. Syringes can also be used for various projects which require small measurements or precise application .
